languages.text: Даже грандиозность событий, произошедших на Эпитафии, не заглушили в душе Ардженты зова таинственной святыни, которую она так стремилась найти. Сестра битвы покинула свиту Вольного Торговца и отправилась в личное паломничество в поисках мира Салис Прайм. Дальнейшая судьба ее неизвестна.

Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.
languages.original_text: Даже грандиозность событий, произошедших на Эпитафии, не заглушили в душе Ардженты зова таинственной святыни, которую она так стремилась найти. Сестра битвы покинула свиту Вольного Торговца и отправилась в личное паломничество в поисках мира Салис Прайм. Дальнейшая судьба ее неизвестна.

traits.locale_text: Even the events on the Epitaph with all their magnitude could not silence the call of a mysterious relic in Argenta's soul. She left Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a personal pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

Even the events on the Epitaph with all their magnitude could not silence the call of a mysterious relic in Argenta's soul. She left Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a personal pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

Even the events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic that she so eagerly sought. She left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate from then on is unknown.

Even the events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic that she so eagerly sought. She left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate from then on is unknown.

Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

languages.text: 阿洁塔极其渴望那件神秘的圣物，即便是荒垄碑碣的那场宿命的战斗，也无法平息这位战斗修女对圣物的渴求。她离开了行商浪人，孤独地踏上了寻找萨利斯主星的朝圣之旅，此后的命运便不得而知。
languages.original_text: Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

traits.locale_text: 阿洁塔极其渴望那件神秘的圣物，即便是荒垄碑碣的那场战斗，也无法平息她的灵魂对圣物呼唤。她离开了行商浪人，孤独地踏上了寻找萨利斯主星的朝圣之旅，此后的命运便不得而知。

languages.text: Selbst die monumentalen Ereignisse auf Epitaph konnten die Sehnsucht in Argentas Seele nicht verstummen lassen. Die Sehnsucht nach dem mysteriösen Relikt, nach dem sie so begierig suchte. Die Schwester der Schlacht verließ das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und begab sich auf eine einsame Pilgerreise auf der Suche nach Salis Prime. Was danach aus ihr geworden ist, ist unbekannt.
languages.original_text: Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Selbst die Ereignisse auf Epitaph konnten die Sehnsucht in Argentas Seele nicht verstummen lassen, die Sehnsucht nach dem mysteriösen Relikt, nach dem sie so begierig suchte. Sie verließ das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und begab sich auf eine einsame Pilgerreise auf der Suche nach Salis Prime. Was danach aus ihr geworden ist, ist unbekannt.

languages.text: Argenta souhaitait si ardemment trouver sa mystérieuse relique que même les événements d'Épitaphe ne parvinrent pas à étouffer son ardeur. La Sœur de Bataille quitta l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et se lança dans un pèlerinage solitaire à la recherche de Salis Primus. Nul ne sait ce qu'il advint d'elle.
languages.original_text: Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Argenta souhaitait si ardemment trouver sa mystérieuse relique que même les événements d'Épitaphe ne parvinrent pas à étouffer son désir. Elle quitta l’entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et se lança dans un pèlerinage solitaire à la recherche de Salis Primus. Nul ne sait à ce jour ce qu'il advint d'elle.

languages.text: Ni siquiera los eventos trascendentales de Epitafio pudieron acallar la llamada que el alma de Argenta sentía por la reliquia misteriosa que con tanto ahínco buscaba. La Hermana de Batalla abandonó el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y se embarcó en un peregrinaje solitario en busca de Salis Prime. Desde ese momento, se desconoce su destino.
languages.original_text: Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Ni siquiera los eventos de Epitafio pudieron acallar la llamada que el alma de Argenta sentía por la reliquia misteriosa que con tanto ahínco buscaba. Abandonó el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y se embarcó en un peregrinaje solitario en busca de Salis Prime. Desde ese momento, se desconoce su destino.

languages.text: エピタフでの驚きの顛末を経てもなお、アルジェンタは謎の遺宝を求めてやまぬ魂の叫びを鎮められずにいた。バトルシスターは自由開拓者の一団を去り、サリス・プライムを求める孤独な巡礼の旅に出た。その後の彼女の消息を知る者はいない。
languages.original_text: Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

traits.locale_text: エピタフでの驚きの顛末を経てもなお、アルジェンタは謎の遺宝を求めてやまぬ魂の叫びを鎮められずにいた。バトルシスターは自由開拓者の一団を去り、サリス・プライムを求める孤独な巡礼の旅に出た。その後の彼女の消息を知る者はいない。

languages.text: Sinyazıt'ta yaşanan büyük olaylar bile Argenta'nın ruhunun yaptığı, gizemli yadigârların peşinden koşma çağrısını susturamadı. Harp Rahibesi, Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden ayrıldı ve Salis Prime'ın arayışında münferit bir hac yolculuğuna çıktı. Sonrasında kendisine ne olduğu bilinmiyor.
languages.original_text: Even the momentous events on Epitaph could not silence the call in Argenta's soul for the mysterious relic she so eagerly sought. The Sister of Battle left the Rogue Trader's retinue and embarked on a solitary pilgrimage in search of Salis Prime. Her fate after that is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Kitabe'de yaşanan büyük olaylar bile Argenta'nın ruhundaki, gizemli yadigârların peşinden koşma çağrısını susturamamıştı. Harp Rahibesi, Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden ayrıldı ve Salis Prime'ın arayışında münferit bir haç yolculuğuna çıktı. Sonrasında kendisine ne olduğu bilinmiyor.
